section.title: Commercial IP Security Option (CIPSO)
section.t: The "Commercial IP Security Option (CIPSO)" label format is documented in and in . While the cited Internet-Draft is long expired, it is widely supported in deployed MLS systems that support IPv4. IANA has assigned IPv4 option number 134 to CIPSO. CIPSO is defined ONLY as an IPv4 option. IANA has never assigned any IPv6 option value to CIPSO.

section.title: Common Architecture Label IPv6 Security Option (CALIPSO)
section.t: The "Common Architecture Label IPv6 Security Option (CALIPSO)" label format is specified in and is defined for IPv6. As noted in Section 10 of CALIPSO is a direct derivative of the IPv4 "Simple IP Security Option (SIPSO)", therefore CALIPSO is NOT derived from CIPSO in any way.
